articles.title: Donald Trump picks Elon Musk for US government cost-cutting role - BBC.com
articles.description: The billionaire will partner with biotech investor Vivek Ramaswamy to "dismantle" bureaucracy, Trump says.
articles.content:
Elon Musk (L) will team up with Vivek Ramaswamy (R) on the project
US President-elect Donald Trump has picked Elon Musk for a role in government cost-cutting, as part of his drive to "dismantle" bur… [+4923 chars]
